website_summaries.verdict: This fast-playing game is a blast whether you have 2 players or 8.
pros: This classic speed game is great when you want to get the whole gang together
With 2 packs of cards, you can play with 2 to 8 players in this game of racing to play every card in your Blitz pile
Each round takes just a few minutes, so it's easy to play this one over and over
cons: Some people may find the speed and intensity of this game intimidating

customer_reviews.title: this game ruined my life
customer_reviews.text: I love this game, don't get me wrong. But now I can't stop playing it. To make matters worse, I play against my girlfriend and she keeps BEATING ME. I don't get it, was I not gifted with lightning fast hand-eye coordination and wit quicker than the speed of light???? I don't know if the game is defective or I'm defective, but I have to win one game against her before I die. It's my only wish in life. Don't buy this if you want to have a relationship with your friends and family. Unless you're highly competitive and good at card games. Then buy it and show the world what you're made of.
customer_reviews.author: Sorrel

customer_reviews.title: Super fun game. Expansion pack IS different!
customer_reviews.text: First of all - this is a great, fast-paced family game. Sort of like Spite and Malice meets Double Solitare. And I would like to clear up this issue about the expansion pack. IT IS DIFFERENT. Anyone who says otherwise must not play the game. It has to do with the color/picture combination on the BACK of the cards, which identifies which cards belongs to which player when the game is over. Of course the fronts are the same. That way everyone can play together. Because of the speed of play, probably not great for small kids, but a good family game. Not over complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS GAME SO MUCH!
customer_reviews.text: The expansion pack to this game takes things to an entirely new level when my family comes together. For some reason, I think adding the expansion pack makes the game slightly harder, and the rounds don't get finished as quickly. That is PERFECT for my family, because we are so competitive. I am so happy with the expansion pack, and we get great use out of it. This is so affordable, given that you actually get the game WITH the expansion pack. I recommend it to anyone who loves fast-paced games!
customer_reviews.author: Mira Byler

customer_reviews.title: Finally! We can play this fun game with a larger group.
customer_reviews.text: Dutch Blitz is a blast to play - great for parties. The problem was that only four could play at once. So, when we had larger groups, we were trying to use one deck for team playing. Now, by adding the expansion set to the original, you can have up to 8 people playing the game at once. This could also be used as a stand-alone Dutch Blitz game. It just has different colors to the shapes to make it possible for more to play. We were happy to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: ET1

customer_reviews.title: It's okay - not a complete miss, but not a favorite
customer_reviews.text: It's okay... Kind of like group solitaire. The yellow color is a little bright/light which I think makes it harder to read fast - which you need to be able to do in this game. Otherwise, if you like solitaire you will like this game. It's not a miss, I am glad we bought it overall and I know we will play it again, but there are a list of other games I would recommend over this one.
customer_reviews.author: EMarie

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated
customer_reviews.text: I have made several attempts at playing this game with various ages of people and it always gets pushed aside. I had hoped it would get played by my son and his college age friends during our weekly "Family Dinner" gathering. We had been playing Five Crowns, which is awesome and fun, but when our group got too big for that game I hoped we could switch to this. Nope. Took too long to figure out and everyone moved on to something else.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Light

customer_reviews.title: Perfect family game and can expand for large groups
customer_reviews.text: We are huge fans of this game! A friend introduced it to me about two years ago and since then we have taught it to lots of friends and family members and gifted them decks. We have purchased multiple original and expansion packs then made marks on the backs of the cards. This has allowed us to play the game with 10 or more people. We slow it down when our kids play and let loose when friends come over and get very competitive. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mary R. Demmler

customer_reviews.title: Fun, simple, portable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game - great for carrying along on brewery trips with friends and family. Scales well for kids and adults. I just wish the game card design was updated... The colors and numbers could be much easier on the eyes. We just joke that it adds more challenge to the game. Be prepared for some intense speed rounds!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra B

customer_reviews.title: Fast Paced Fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to play, fun for the family. Probably recommend for ages 10+ just because of how fast-paced the game is. It's like combining solitaire and Uno in one crazy game. I would definitely recommend getting the carrying case just for ease of storage and use. A great way to learn to play without trying to decipher the written instructions is just finding a video online. Also note, special instructions for only 2 players say to have 5 post piles! Didn't realize this until weeks after my son and I played together.
customer_reviews.author: OneTreeStudio

customer_reviews.title: Same symbols on the backs, just different colors.
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression from the packaging that the design on the back of the cards would be the beautiful Scandinavian style icons shown on the box. I do have to say I was disappointed that they were the exact same (boring ones, in my opinion) as the original game, just different colors - lol. I also think that makes it more confusing when sorting them out. Would love the see both sets of the game - which is a blast to play - with more artistic designs on the backs, but that's just me! :) LOVE the game, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great game, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great game for a wide spread of ages. My nieces and nephews (even down to 5/6 years old) have picked it up (even if it's at a slower pace) and really enjoy it. The expansion pack is great too because I cannot tell you how many times I've been in a group that wanted to play Dutch Blitz and it ended up leaving someone (or several someones) out because only 4 could play. Also, the symbols on the back of the cards (not just colors) are great for colorblind players as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: The expansion pack was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is fun and easy to learn, and the quality of the cards are great. Shipped on time and were brand new. However, the expansion pack was disappointing- the company didn't bother to introduce four new/different icons for the back of the cards; you get the same four types of cards from the original pack which have swapped colors from the original icons. The company could have at least printed the expansion pack cards with a different color back; that would have made it a 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great card game for everybody
customer_reviews.text: This is a great card game to get for your family it is easy to learn fast pace and it gets everybody involved I would definitely buy both packs the original pack and the expansion pack then you can play up to eight players. Great for camping or anytime you want to play a game
customer_reviews.author: MamaZombie

customer_reviews.title: crazy, noisy, fast, fun!
customer_reviews.text: I had not heard of Dutch Blitz before, but my daughter-in-law played it at a friend's house and loved it. So i got it for her, and we played it. Turns out it's very similar to a game we used to play, with regular cards, but we called it Nerts. Its really fun. The regular set is for 4 people, and I also got the extension set, for 4 more people with different colored cards. It's very fast moving, and chaotic and fun!
customer_reviews.author: B. Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun game to play with 4 people. It is easy to learn and fast paced. I purchased the expansion pack and the only complaint I have is that I wish the expansion pack had different colors instead of different drawings to distinguish different piles of cards. The different colors would make it way easier to distinguish different piles/teams. I would highly recommend this game for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Park

customer_reviews.title: This game.
customer_reviews.text: This game. SOOO fun!! My family has played it for years and we forgot about it more recently. There’s so many of us so we had to order an expansion pack but we’ve had so much fun with it at my moms that we decided to get our own to play with friends. Just taught my husband too and now he thinks it’s the best! Easy to learn, easy and fun to play, can keep points or not if you’re less competitive, and makes for hours of fun! You need the expansion pack if you’re playing with more than 4 people though.
customer_reviews.author: brutallyhonestreviews

customer_reviews.title: My Life Hack on Expansion Deck
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t received my cards yet, but I see that there is a lot of disappointment over the same color cards, but swapped image in the expansion pack. My hack will be to use a permanent marker, and draw a circle around the image on the back of all the expansion pack cards. That will make it easier to distinguish the original yellow from the expansion yellow, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dechant

customer_reviews.title: BEST GAME EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriends parents introduced us to this game and WOW. It’s so much fun! It’s like a mixture of speed/go fish. Just read the rules and you’ll be fine. It’s great for 4 but with the expansion pack, you can have up to 8. Would definitely recommend and will certainly order another pack soon because we’ve already worn out 1 pack from playing so much lol
customer_reviews.author: Sara Marr

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Originally from Pennsylvania Dutch Country, this is a fun and fast-paced game unlike any card game that I know. It gets pretty intense when you have 3 or more players. The review asked me to rate the 'Stretch'. What the &$*^% is that!? Who is writing these things? Does anyone (that has a brain) CHECK these things?!
customer_reviews.author: J.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This took less than five minutes to learn! If you have ever played solitaire, you are almost there. We played this over the holidays with our kids ( ages 24 and 28) and other family members ( high school age), but it is perfect for all ages. It gets pretty fast and competitive,and might be frustrating for younger kids, but this is highly recommended for a fun family card game.
customer_reviews.author: K. Young

customer_reviews.title: 💚💙Best. Game. Ever!❤️💛
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that they use the same colors & symbols for the expansion pack, but just mix them up. I wish they had chosen to use four new symbols & colors like purple, orange, brown, and black. The game is still awesome though! If you like UNO or solitaire, you will love this game!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Fun & fast game!! Perfect for anyone!!
customer_reviews.text: We've played this game for 30+ years... Perfect for all ages. It's fast, fun and interactive. We've played on floors, tables and even benches... A litetal "take anywhere" game!! These cards are the best and the easiest way to include more than 4 people... You'll be hooked!! Perfectly priced, came on time!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Fun, quick moving game for children and adults!
customer_reviews.text: We learned to play this game when we lived in a Dutch Amish and Mennonite community. Very fast paced and fun. All ages in our family can play, the expansion pack makes it perfect for larger families! We can play with up to 8 now. Cards are nice quality, printing is bright and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lot's O Fun
customer_reviews.text: Had never seen such a card game before where the basic playing is similar to solitaire but for multiple players (up to 8 with bonus pack). It takes a bit to really get the 'hang' of it, but once you figure it out, it is great fun. We enjoyed it so much that we have purchased other game packs for gifts. Great game...
customer_reviews.author: Craig F Adams

customer_reviews.title: We love the fact that you can play with 8 people
customer_reviews.text: Huge dutch blitz lovers here... We love the fact that you can play with 8 people, but the distinguishing colors on the expansion pack are exactly the same as the other pack, yet instead of a yellow bucket, there is a red bucket. Definitely wish that they would have brought on different colors and different shapes to further distinguish the players cards... but it still works at expanding the game!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best Game!
customer_reviews.text: Don't just buy the single set. Get both the green and blue box (expanded) so you can play with more people. This game gets played more than any other game in our home and on vacation. I keep it in my purse to play while waiting in restaurants, airports etc. It's fast! We like to clear chairs and play standing up!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: THE EXPANSION PACK IS NOT WHAT YOU THINK
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this game, and I do not regret buying it. However, the expansion pack is not what I thought it would be. The original pack has cards marked with four images in four colors, and I expected the expansion pack to have entirely new shapes and/or colors. It actually just has the same images and colors but mismatched. When playing with both packs together, sorting them back out gets very disorienting.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: and our whole family loved it. I bought this set for my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Played this game a lot when my kids were younger, and our whole family loved it. I bought this set for my daughter and her family to enjoy. The game is easy enough for younger family members to learn and play it, but challenging enough and very fast-paced for adults to likewise enjoy it. The expansion pack enables more than 4 people to play from the standard deck.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mori

customer_reviews.title: Die Hard Dutch Blitz Fans
customer_reviews.text: Die hard Dutch Blitz lovers here! And now we don't have to use two of the same deck of cards with one set marked with a pen when we play with more than the four of us. Thank you for the great idea of an expansion pack! We'll continue to play this often with a little more ease and finesse.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Carter

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fast game.
customer_reviews.text: This is a new game for us and our grandchildren. It uses hand/eye coordination to put down your cards as quickly as you can. Unfortunately one of the set of cards which came in this game were flawed. Each box is supposed to hold 4 sets of 40 cards in each set. Our box held 2 sets of 40 cards, 1 set of 60 cards and 1 set of 20 cards. We received a defective game.
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and addicting
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun. Played it at a party, bought it on Amazon that night! I think everyone I've played it with since then has also bought it. It's like "spit" on steroids, and for up to 8 people with the expansion, it gets CRAZY.
customer_reviews.author: G. Willette

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: A fun, easy-to-learn card game for all ages. My son's girlfriend, who is in her early 20s, introduced my family to Dutch Blitz and now we're all hooked. My 14-year-old daughter, who is especially adept at this fast-paced card matching game, thinks it's one of the best games ever. Dutch Blitz is fun for two people but it's more challenging with four players.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun. Is very similar to solitare with a group of people but you don't need special cards and can have more players with solitare but still a lot of fun. Had just as much fun playing solitare with regular playing cardseach deck different design and with just as many people. This game does add a couple more elements to make it more challenging. Fun game and would recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Toni51

customer_reviews.title: The Whole Family Loves This Game!
customer_reviews.text: We got this game to play with our children who still live at home, and they are hooked! We also took it along (in the great carry case that we also purchased) to Thanksgiving with us, and now our grown children and Grandma are hooked too. Fun game to play with the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle Smoot

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this game and even my 7 year old can play with us. We tried to make it a little easier on him (offering to only counting one point for the cards left in his blitz pile or put less cards in his blitz pile, etc) but he wouldn't have it. A fun game for all ages!! Good for hand/eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Intense card game for game night
customer_reviews.text: Solitaire and Speed Combine!! This is one of my favorite card games to play with my friends. Although it scares new players and it does have a steeper learning curve compare to other card games, once you play a few rounds, you will be addicted!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Such fun
customer_reviews.text: My son introduced this to us over the holidays and WOW it is so much fun, grandkids are 7-11 and all of them play really well, even the 7 year old! It is so much fun and I do not like card games! Cards are typical, hold up average.......if more than 4 people playing you need the expansion pack.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Griz

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great
customer_reviews.text: This is a surprisingly fun game and once you understand the rules, it's fast paced, easy and fun. My beef is really with the expansion pack. I was sorely disappointed to see the SAME four colors but with different picture. Lost a star and a half in my book for that.
customer_reviews.author: iTeach

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fun game to play with a group! Our friends brought it over and it was very easy to pick up and learn. Excited to have our own deck now and also the expansion to be able to play with more people!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Large Family Game Night
customer_reviews.text: With the regular deck plus an expansion pack, our family of 9 can all enjoy the same game at the same time (8 playing). Even the youngest kids have started picking up the process and will "play" with any extra decks.
customer_reviews.author: H. Indahl

customer_reviews.title: Not interesting to us
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to figure out how to play it correctly. It came as advertised but it wasn't very interesting. We thought it might be more fun to play with the kids. At least it's another game in the house.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: The game is exactly as described. The boxes are colorful and sturdy. The game arrived very quickly and was packed with lots of packaging to protect it. Fun for all ages. We played this for hours on Christmas Eve with kids and adults and had nonstop fun!
customer_reviews.author: MomZGee

customer_reviews.title: 8??  How??
customer_reviews.text: We love this game as a family, but our old set was worn out and the last time we tried to play, we found that we were missing cards. I promptly went to amazon to order new cards and found this. I was thrilled to learn that there was an expansion packet making it possible for up to 8 players. Unfortunately when I opened the packets, I was very disappointed to see that they were the exact same cards, just in different boxes. I do not understand how we are supposed to play 8 players if the cards are the same 4 colors!
customer_reviews.author: Elle ~ Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best game
customer_reviews.text: One of the most fun games ever! My daughter told me about this and I ordered it to go on a trip with three other couples. Everyone loved it. Easy to learn but you may want to order a backup set as you really get competitive and cards get bent! (No fault of the cards!)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Veneris

customer_reviews.title: Played for 1week straight & counting
customer_reviews.text: Introduced to son at youth retreat and bought them the following week. These cards have not been put back into their box since. Kids introduced them the grandma and I believe it was her favorite also. Fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rom

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for families, even overseas
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy the card game at home so we bought packs for our relatives in Sweden and gave them as gifts at Christmas. Now, they keep sending pictures of the kids playing and enjoying the game! Great gift to teach and give to others while visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick pace game
customer_reviews.text: Our family really like this game. Haven’t got tired of it yet! (3 months) The instructions were a bit confusing, so we watched a YouTube video. But once you get it, it’s really not complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: VONDERFUL GOOT FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do you like crazy fast hand-eye coordinated competitive games? This is the one for you! I usually play with 3 others, but this pack makes it possible, although inconceivable, 7 others! Yikes!
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this game
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this game! It is so fun and so fast! I played it years ago and was excited to introduce my kids (10-14 year olds) to it and they loved it too! Very fun for all ages...probably more of age 8 or up. :-) We have enough in our family that we needed the expansion pack too! (Unfortunately our "Original set" came with too many "green pump" cards (60) and only 20 "Blue Plow" cards. We don't need to return the whole game but just need a complete set of the Blue Plow Cards. Can we be sent those, or do we need to return the whole set? Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to play. With teenage kids were always looking for someway to incorporate a family atmosphere. This is a fun game that I can play in all had a good time with it. Glad we got it
customer_reviews.author: Felice Navidad

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed playing this card game as a family. We took it with us on vacation, it doesn't take up a lot of space, but provides hours of family game fun! My son talked the Grandparents into playing along and they had a good time also!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Of Reading

customer_reviews.title: Love this Game!
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I LOVE this game. I'm talking every time we get together, there's a group of us playing. It is a fun, challenging and fast game. It may be a little hard or confusing to learn in the beginning, but you WILL get the hang of it. Even the kids learn, and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Monet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect game for game night!
customer_reviews.text: I used to play this game as a kid. I recently introduced it to some friends. It was a blast to play as an adult and with adult beverages in hand it definitely got rowdy! They loved it so much, I just got them their own set. It is fast paced, but not so difficult you can't muster playing after a few martinis. Instructions are a little dense (I needed a refresher after so many years), but I'm sure YouTube has a good demo you can watch to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyrod

customer_reviews.title: Fun Family Game
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this game by a friend and the rest is history. Great game to play on game night, family game night its fun it gets crazy and the last thing you want to hear when you have lots of cards in your hand is......"BLITZ". Recommend buying two packs so 6-8 can play. I have two packs.
customer_reviews.author: SKDemberg

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family (even your drunk friends).
customer_reviews.text: This is a ridiculously great game, easy to learn and fun to play. It's quite clean, and appropriate for all ages, but we usually get a bunch of adults together and play drunk or high. The more people you have, the funner it is!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Check your decks!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this game so we wanted the expansion pack to enable more of us to play at a time. We were not able to do that because one of the decks in the expansion pack is the same as the original . This means only 7 people could play instead of 8 and one deck would be useless. I have reordered twice and it has come this way each time. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal F.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I absolutely love playing this game. It takes a couple slower hands to pick up how to play but once you get it it’s a blast. Directions are easy to read. I also you tubed a video for my kids to watch. They are more visual learners. It is a very fast moving game
customer_reviews.author: ajshell

customer_reviews.title: Fun for hours
customer_reviews.text: We love this game. The neighbor girl introduced it to us. We play it all the time for hours at a time or for just minutes if we don't have a lot of time. It's easy to learn and teaches eye / hand coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Lacii S

customer_reviews.title: How Fun!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun game! Fast paced and entertaining. Good for young and old. Makes you quickly think and isn’t too complicated. My 18-year old niece can’t get enough of this game too. Get the double pack since you only can play with 4 players with the single pack. This is a FUN group game. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Husband and I play it nightly
customer_reviews.text: Used to play with with friends all the time as a child and missed it so I purchased this. I was teaching my husband to play and at first he complained it was boring... but now he begs me to play it every night :) Having friends over this weekend so I cant wait to make use of the expansion pack.
customer_reviews.author: Plantlover

customer_reviews.title: ... by another Mom with grown kids this was a fun family game
customer_reviews.text: Was told by another Mom with grown kids this was a fun family game, independent but working together. My family of 4 with an 18 yo and 14yo enjoyed it. It took playing a couple of times before all the rules sunk in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: This is a family favorite, highly competitive game!
customer_reviews.text: This game has been a family favorite for some time! Fast moving, highly competitive card game that definitely keeps us at the edge of our seats ( I actually stand, ha). Cards are definitely on the higher end, which is good as they get thrown all across the table! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Graves

customer_reviews.title: Fun game-hours and hours of enjoyment!
customer_reviews.text: Whole family loves this game. Our adult daughter got her own set (even though she is welcome to use the “family” set), and my sil also got a set for their family to play.
customer_reviews.author: Family valley

customer_reviews.title: Fun table game
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun for a small or big group. Once you understand the rules, it is really easy to play. We have played as teams and individuals. A different game each time and it is luck and observation that helps you win! Loads of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: languagelady

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY FOR GAME NIGHT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously one of the best games I have ever played! The original version is only for up to four players and that is crazy at first, but the true fun and chaos comes when you have the expansion pack and can play with up to 8 players. It is literally madness, but it is so much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for kids ages 10+
customer_reviews.text: Easy game to learn, but very fast paced and involved some brain power. You can only play max 4 people per deck, so getting both bumps your player count to 8 which is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daphney

customer_reviews.title: Quick and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this game. We found it easiest to search for a video online to explain how th game works as the directions provided are kinda wordy and hard to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Briana S.

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy it, easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: If your reactions are slow you will struggle with this game. Have to have good hand eye reflexes as this game is like a multiplayer speed version of solitaire. Fun to play but high speed. I think best for teen and up...
customer_reviews.author: Dadof-Girls

customer_reviews.title: Crazy fun
customer_reviews.text: Great card game, easy enough to learn, and fun with 2 players, insanely fun with four or five. Addictive - played for hours over a holiday weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fun, high speed card game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game if you like to think fast and move faster! Lots of fun and the expansion pack makes it easier to enjoy with more people!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Murdock

customer_reviews.title: BEST GAME EVER
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this game from a Pennsylvanian friend and am hooked. I played with all of my friends and family and now it’s all we want to do. It brings out the most competitive side of people, and is easy to pick up for a few minutes. Best game ever, seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Carrieann Towne

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for a friend, and he was excited. The game is great for a good family time with laughs and competition.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: I force my all my friends to play it with me until they’re sick of it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the expansion pack had 4 new colors/symbols on the back! Simply shifting the colors of the symbols often leads to accidental mis-sorting.
customer_reviews.author: David Witt

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. It takes a minute to learn and understand what you’re supposed to be doing but definitely worth learning :)
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Super fun fast-paced card game!
customer_reviews.text: Dutch Blitz is a fun fast-paced card game and one of our family favorites!! We have bought several packs over the years and even have drawn stars with a sharpie onto the backs of a new pack to allow up to 12 people to play at a time (with 2 original packs - one marked, and the expansion pack). Our children even bought their own to take with them to college.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Play at your own pace!
customer_reviews.text: Great game for those that enjoy an intense or relaxed game! Play at ur pace but still play to win. Easy and good for the mind.
customer_reviews.author: Micah R.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful fun and great service!!!
customer_reviews.text: what a fun game!!! our senior group played and we had such fun! this was a card game developed by Christians who were not allowed to play regular card games... it is fun and good for all ages!!! my kids would have loved it! service was great and if our group enlarges may have to get another double set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gods Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Buy this game. My family from age 5 to ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy this game. My family from age 5 to adult loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Team Green

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We were introduced to this game years ago and given a deck. We needed to replace it do to much idea he. So much fun! Keeps one on their ties constantly. More people, more challenge. 😁
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, get lots of people asking me where to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this game. So happy they came out with an expansion pack so more people can play. Worth every penny, you will have lots of fun in this fast paced game.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great game and this was a GREAT deal to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game and this was a GREAT deal to get the original and expansion at the same time. Its 75% a game of chance and 25% a game of how quickly you can see/move the cards. Tons of fun but beware with super competitive people. :)
customer_reviews.author: rainbowdolph

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. The original pack missing 3 cards, 157 instead of 160, bummer... The extension pack cards were all there. Giving 4 stars due to missing cards, the game itself is 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun and easy to learn. My daughter started playing this when she was 6. It was easy for her to pick up and it’s fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Velena Phillips

customer_reviews.title: If you like fast-paced games, this is one for you
customer_reviews.text: My wife is from PA, so we absolutely loved the motif. This came is considerable fun, the rounds go fast so a match can fit into almost any allotment of spare time you may have. Game play with the expansion is easy, and having more people does in fact multiply the fun.
customer_reviews.author: billhank

customer_reviews.title: Fun family night game
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game for the family. Purchased this pack for our family of 5 players. If you just have 4 players, you don’t need to buy the expansion pack.
customer_reviews.author: NakaMama

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, fast-paced game
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fast-paced game that keeps our teenagers’ interest. This is their favorite game to play with the family and they get pretty competitive with it. Each box allows 4 players. There are six of us and we often add a friend or two. We had to get a new set for both of my kids when they left for college. Very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Chumly

customer_reviews.title: Dumb Dutch write up
customer_reviews.text: This is a "goot" product, but the dumb Dutch description written on the box is at best insulting to the Amish, and project a dumb and unhelpful stereotype. Amish are people, just like everyone else, and most I know take some umbrage at these characterizations.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kann

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play. So addicting.
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game for the family. It definitely takes someone who already knows it to teach the group, but once you have it down it’s addicting and can play for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Will Healy

customer_reviews.title: Such fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves playing games and this is one our favorites! Even my 9 year old grandson asked to play this every time we get together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun across cultures
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game! I brought it with me when I studied abroad and played with my friends in the evenings! Everyone loved it, and explaining the Amish lifestyle to my European friends was an added fun bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: You may find yourself hopelessly addicted to this game...
customer_reviews.text: This game is nonstop fun for everyone! When I say nonstop, I mean you won't be able to stop playing it for the next three days and you will find yourself hopelessly addicted to it. This game is so fast paced you'll never know what hit you.
customer_reviews.author: Klairine

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fast-paced card game. Great for family.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast-paced game that is a lot of fun. Up to 8 players if you have a big enough table. This has been a great addition to our game lineup.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN K

customer_reviews.title: I love this game and have since I was a wee ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this game and have since I was a wee little fella! And stacking is NOT a "house rule" all you so called purists, I'm just better at the game than you are!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Jarnes

customer_reviews.title: Great family card games
customer_reviews.text: Great family game. Wish it came with a card holder like our old set did. The ala cartel holder is a tad expensive for what you get. Good quality cards. This is very important as the game can get a little rough. Highly recommended this game for great fun with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fun game! Helpful to have someone explain rules at first.
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Like a mix of gin-rummy and solitaire. Does help to have someone who has played before explain the game and practice with you. Hard to gram the concept from just the instructions. But after 2-3 rounds, you will want to share either friends and family too. Great For game night!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Now we can play with more people!
customer_reviews.text: We love Dutch Blitz. But the only draw back has been that it is limited to 4 players. Now with the expansion we can have up to 8 people playing at once. What a great idea!!
customer_reviews.author: KDD

customer_reviews.title: So much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, easy to learn and play, good for groups of 3-10. Though the more people you include, the more INTENSE it can get. Buy the expansion pack now so you don't leave people out. You won't regret this purchase. We started calling it Dutch Baby by accident and it stuck. lol
customer_reviews.author: McNallison

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves this game. We had to make sure to get extension pack so all of us can play. ( 5 of us )
customer_reviews.author: Lindsie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun fun and more fun. I never would have picked this up but a friend showed it to us. If you like speed and need something a little more complex this is the game and if the group agrees you can change up the rules a little to make it harder. Get this game.
customer_reviews.author: Amharic

customer_reviews.title: Get the expansion
customer_reviews.text: This game has tons of rules and piles and counting and fun. If you can get through the rules this is an incredible game for 4 people with one deck and 8 people with 2. We play 8 people all of the time and the stress level is high but were always laughing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kersey

product_meta.title: Dutch Blitz Original and Expansion Pack Set Card Game
product_meta.description: Size:Basic packDeveloped in Pennsylvania Dutch country, Dutch Blitz is a card game that's exciting to play and easy to learn. Perfect for family game nights, or to play with a group of good friends, you'll enjoy spirited competition as you try to get rid of your 10-card Blitz pile before anybody else. Not as easy as it sounds, though, because players don't take turns. You have to be the fastest to place your cards in sequence and in the same respective colors on the center Dutch piles while using as many cards from your Blitz Pile as possible. When your Blitz Pile has been exhausted, you've won. The original game includes four decks of 4 colorful playing cards and easy-to-follow instructions, while the expansion adds another four decks of different colors. Combine the packs to play with up to 8 players.
feature_bullets: Contains Dutch Blitz and Expansion Set
Combine packs to play with up to 8 players
